long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lite Wallet is an extension where you can save a summary of the cryptocurrencies you own. With Lite Wallet you will be able to see at a quick glance the amount of cryptocurrencies you have, their real price and the exchange price in dollars of each one. You can also see the total of all your cryptocurrencies in dollars and euros.
To add cryptocurrencies to your wallet, just type their symbol in the first field and press update.
